lead_paragraph: The governor said an inquiry at the Alabama Law Enforcement Agency had “found a number of issues, including possible misuse of state funds.”

headline.print_headline: Alabama: Head of Police Agency Fired
headline.main: Alabama: Head of Police Agency Fired

snippet: The governor said an inquiry at the Alabama Law Enforcement Agency had “found a number of issues, including possible misuse of state funds.”
abstract: Alabama Gov Robert Bentley fires Spencer Collier, state law enforcement secretary, following internal investigation that revealed possible misuse of state funds, among other concerns.
